freenet.client
Interface FECCallback

All Known Implementing Classes:
SplitFileFetcherSegment, SplitFileInserterSegment
public interface FECCallback

An interface wich has to be implemented by FECJob submitters

Author:
Florent Daignière <nextgens@freenetproject.org> WARNING: the callback is expected to release the thread !

Method Summary
 void onDecodedSegment(com.db4o.ObjectContainer container, ClientContext context, FECJob job, Bucket[] dataBuckets, Bucket[] checkBuckets, SplitfileBlock[] dataBlocks, SplitfileBlock[] checkBlocks)

          The implementor MUST copy the data manually from the arrays on the FECJob, because db4o persists arrays as inline values, so WE CANNOT UPDATE THE ARRAY!!
 void onFailed(Throwable t, com.db4o.ObjectContainer container, ClientContext context)
          Something broke.
 

Method Detail

onEncodedSegment

void onEncodedSegment(com.db4o.ObjectContainer container,
                      ClientContext context,
                      FECJob job,
                      Bucket[] dataBuckets,
                      Bucket[] checkBuckets,
                      SplitfileBlock[] dataBlocks,
                      SplitfileBlock[] checkBlocks)
The implementor MUST copy the data manually from the arrays on the FECJob, because db4o persists arrays as inline values, so WE CANNOT UPDATE THE ARRAY!!

container -
context -
